# Dotfiles

### Setup
- Distro: Arch
- WM: dwm (flexipatch)
- Status Bar: dwmblocks
- Terminal Emulator: kitty
- Shell : zsh 
- Prompt : Spaceship-Prompt (https://github.com/denysdovhan/spaceship-prompt)
- Theme: Dracula (https://draculatheme.com/)
- Menu : Rofi



### Vim (nvim)
#### Plugins
- Syntax Completion: COC
- File Tree: NERDTree
- Tagbar
- Status Line: Vim-Airline
- Snippets: UltiSnips
